union
select distinct CONCAT(( @rowNo := @rowNo + 1 )) AS rowNo, #{getYandM} As yearAndMonth, T002.employeeNo, if(T002.employeeFormCode is null || T002.employeeFormCode = "","",M005.employeeFormName) as employeeFormName, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName,T001.employeeLastName)as employeeName, T002.employeeStatus, M014.occupationName, T018.deductionsAndOvertimePay , T018.deductionsAndOvertimePayOfUnitPrice , T006.admissionStartDate, T006.admissionEndDate, if(T002.employeeStatus = "2",CAST((T006.unitPrice*(1 + T012.taxRate)) As unsigned),CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned)) As unitPrice, CAST(T005.salary As unsigned) As salary, CAST((ifnull(T013.transportationExpenses,0) + ifnull(if(T005.fristBonusMonth = #{getYandM},T005.fristTimeBonusAmount,0) + if(T005.secondBonusMonth = #{getYandM},T005.secondTimeBonusAmount,0),0) + ifnull(T005.insuranceFeeAmount,0)+ifnull(T013.otherAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.leaderAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.introductionAllowance,0)) As unsigned) As otherFee, CAST(T005.waitingCost As unsigned) As waitingCost, ifnull(if(T002.employeeStatus = "2",T006.unitPrice*(1 + T012.taxRate),T006.unitPrice),0) - (ifnull(T005.salary,0) + ifnull(T013.transportationExpenses,0) + ifnull(if(#{getYandM} = T005.fristBonusMonth,T005.fristTimeBonusAmount,0) + if(#{getYandM} = T005.secondBonusMonth,T005.secondTimeBonusAmount,0),0) + ifnull(T005.insuranceFeeAmount,0) +ifnull(T013.otherAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.leaderAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.introductionAllowance,0) + ifnull(T005.waitingCost,0)) As monthlyGrosProfits
from (
select T005.employeeNo,T005.reflectYearAndMonth,T005.salary FROM T005WagesInfo as T005 inner join ( select employeeNo, max(reflectYearAndMonth) as reflectYearAndMonth from T005WagesInfo where reflectYearAndMonth <= #{getYandM} group by employeeNo) as temp on temp.employeeNo = T005.employeeNo and temp.reflectYearAndMonth = T005.reflectYearAndMonth ) as A left join T005WagesInfo As T005 on A.employeeNo = T005.employeeNo and A.reflectYearAndMonth = T005.reflectYearAndMonth left join ( select employeeNo, max(expensesReflectYearAndMonth) as expensesReflectYearAndMonth from T013ExpensesInfo where expensesReflectYearAndMonth <= #{getYandM} group by employeeNo ) as C on A.employeeNo = C.employeeNo left join T013ExpensesInfo As T013 on C.employeeNo = T013.employeeNo and C.expensesReflectYearAndMonth = T013.expensesReflectYearAndMonth left join T002EmployeeDetail as T002 ON A.employeeNo =T002.employeeNo left join M005EmployeeForm as M005 ON T002.employeeFormCode=M005.employeeFormCode left join M014Occupation as M014 ON T002.occupationCode = M014.occupationCode left join T001Employee as T001 ON A.employeeNo = T001.employeeNo left join T012Passwordreset as T012 ON T012.passwordResetId = "systemSet" left join T018WorkTotalTime as T018 ON T002.employeeNo =T018.employeeNo AND #{getYandM} = T018.attendanceYearAndMonth left join T006EmployeeSiteInfo as T006 ON A.employeeNo = T006.employeeNo AND #{getYandM} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and IFNULL(admissionEndDate,"999999"), (SELECT @rowNo := 0 ) AS rowNo
WHERE (T002.retirementYearAndMonth = "" or LEFT(T002.retirementYearAndMonth,6) >= #{getYandM} or retirementResonClassification = "2" )
AND T002.employeeStatus = #{employeeClassification}
AND T002.employeeFormCode = #{employeeForms}
AND T002.occupationCode = #{employeeOccupation}
AND (#{getYandM} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and left(admissionEndDate,6) or (#{getYandM} >= left(admissionStartDate,6) AND admissionEndDate is null AND workState != "3" ))
AND admissionStartDate is null or workState = "3"
AND CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned) between CAST((#{utilPricefront}*10000) As unsigned) and CAST(( #{utilPriceback}*10000) As unsigned)
AND CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned) >= #{utilPricefront}*10000
AND CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned) <= #{utilPriceback}*10000
AND T005.salary between ${salaryFront}*10000 and ${salaryBack}*10000
AND T005.salary >= ${salaryFront}*10000
AND T005.salary <= ${salaryBack}*10000
AND (ifnull(if(T002.employeeStatus = "2",T006.unitPrice*(1 + T012.taxRate),T006.unitPrice),0) - (ifnull(T005.salary,0) + ifnull(T013.transportationExpenses,0) + ifnull(if(#{getYandM} = T005.fristBonusMonth,T005.fristTimeBonusAmount,0) + if(#{getYandM} = T005.secondBonusMonth,T005.secondTimeBonusAmount,0),0) + ifnull(T005.insuranceFeeAmount,0) +ifnull(T013.otherAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.leaderAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.introductionAllowance,0) + ifnull(T005.waitingCost,0))) between ${grossProfitFront}*10000 and ${grossProfitBack}*10000
AND (ifnull(if(T002.employeeStatus = "2",T006.unitPrice*(1 + T012.taxRate),T006.unitPrice),0) - (ifnull(T005.salary,0) + ifnull(T013.transportationExpenses,0) + ifnull(if(#{getYandM} = T005.fristBonusMonth,T005.fristTimeBonusAmount,0) + if(#{getYandM} = T005.secondBonusMonth,T005.secondTimeBonusAmount,0),0) + ifnull(T005.insuranceFeeAmount,0) +ifnull(T013.otherAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.leaderAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.introductionAllowance,0) + ifnull(T005.waitingCost,0))) >= ${grossProfitFront}*10000
AND (ifnull(if(T002.employeeStatus = "2",T006.unitPrice*(1 + T012.taxRate),T006.unitPrice),0) - (ifnull(T005.salary,0) + ifnull(T013.transportationExpenses,0) + ifnull(if(#{getYandM} = T005.fristBonusMonth,T005.fristTimeBonusAmount,0) + if(#{getYandM} = T005.secondBonusMonth,T005.secondTimeBonusAmount,0),0) + ifnull(T005.insuranceFeeAmount,0) +ifnull(T013.otherAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.leaderAllowanceAmount,0) + ifnull(T013.introductionAllowance,0) + ifnull(T005.waitingCost,0))) <= ${grossProfitBack}*10000

union
SELECT distinct #{getYandM} as yearAndMonth, T006.employeeNo, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName,T001.employeeLastName)as employeeName, T002.employeeStatus, if(T002.employeeFormCode is null || T002.employeeFormCode = "","",M005.employeeFormName) as employeeFormName, M014.occupationName, left(T006.admissionStartDate,6) as admissionStartDate, left(T006.admissionEndDate,6) as admissionEndDate, CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned) as unitPrice, CAST((T011.bpUnitPrice*10000) As unsigned) as salary, ifnull(T006.unitPrice,0) - ifnull(T011.bpUnitPrice,0)*10000 as monthlyGrosProfits, T007.customerName as bpBelongCustomer FROM T006EmployeeSiteInfo as T006 left Join (select T011.* FROM T011BpInfoSupplement as T011 inner join ( select bpEmployeeNo, max(unitPriceStartMonth) as unitPriceStartMonth from T011BpInfoSupplement where unitPriceStartMonth <= #{getYandM} group by bpEmployeeNo) as temp on temp.bpEmployeeNo = T011.bpEmployeeNo and temp.unitPriceStartMonth = T011.unitPriceStartMonth) as T011 on T011.bpEmployeeNo = T006.employeeNo left Join T007CustomerInfo as T007 on T011.bpBelongCustomerCode = T007.customerNo left join T001Employee as T001 ON T006.employeeNo = T001.employeeNo left join T002EmployeeDetail as T002 ON T006.employeeNo = T002.employeeNo left join M014Occupation as M014 ON T002.occupationCode = M014.occupationCode left join M005EmployeeForm as M005 ON T002.employeeFormCode = M005.employeeFormCode WHERE left(T006.employeeNo,2) = "BP" and (#{getYandM} between left(T006.admissionStartDate,6) and left(T006.admissionEndDate,6) or (#{getYandM} >= left(T006.admissionStartDate,6) and left(T006.admissionEndDate,6) is null) )
AND T002.employeeStatus = #{employeeClassification}
AND T002.employeeFormCode = #{employeeForms}
AND T002.occupationCode = #{employeeOccupation}
AND (#{getYandM} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and left(admissionEndDate,6) or #{getYandM} >= left(admissionStartDate,6) AND admissionEndDate is null)
AND admissionStartDate is null
AND CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned) between CAST((#{utilPricefront}*10000) As unsigned) and CAST(( #{utilPriceback}*10000) As unsigned)
AND CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned) >= #{utilPricefront}*10000
AND CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned) <= #{utilPriceback}*10000
AND T011.bpUnitPrice*10000 between ${salaryFront}*10000 and ${salaryBack}*10000
AND T011.bpUnitPrice*10000 >= ${salaryFront}*10000
AND T011.bpUnitPrice*10000 <= ${salaryBack}*10000
AND T006.unitPrice - T011.bpUnitPrice*10000 between ${grossProfitFront}*10000 and ${grossProfitBack}*10000
AND T006.unitPrice - T011.bpUnitPrice*10000 >= ${grossProfitFront}*10000
AND T006.unitPrice - T011.bpUnitPrice*10000 <= ${grossProfitBack}*10000
